description: reds, black, bright red-pink, blue and yellow woodblock print; blue bird with yellow and red in upper center; bird has head crest and rectangular tail, and is covered with black multidirectional lines; black vertical lines suggesting grass at bottom below bird; background is abstract layers of red patterning--paint splatter-like splotches, diagonal lines, tiny dots and areas of solid color; black area of background above bird
inscription: LLC in pencil: 青い鳥 1960 {Aoi tori}
medium: Woodblock print; ink and color on paper
title: Blue Bird
